article_title: The Morning Download: Global Tech Sector Under Pressure as 2016 Gets Underway
article_text:
European Pressphoto Agency

The tech sector began 2016 with a sobering jolt, a sign that the excesses of the recent past will be corrected. Stock trading in mainland China was halted Monday after a 7% decline. Stock and futures prices also declined in Europe and the U.S.
